page.title: 17THE ROYAL STAR AND GARTER
page.content: This home is for ex-servicemen who are not quite able to look after themselves. Most are permanent patients but some go there for several years. They use old fashioned sewing machines to build up their muscles. Many of the men are in wheelchairs and don't use their muscles very much. Some of the men are not too bad and are able to drive cars and that is why they have a garage. The home has a swimming pool and there is a special lift which can move the men up and down into the water. For those who are permanent they have a single room, some double rooms and some wards. If they had toothache there would be no need for them to go out because they have their own dentist and a bar and a canteen. Famous people,including Jimmy Saville, have been there for charity reasons.
